newsitem.title: USA: PremiumWear names David Berg as COO.
newsitem.headline: PremiumWear names David Berg as COO.

text.p: PremiumWear Inc said it appointed David Berg to the new position of chief operating officer and executive vice president.
It also named James Bury as vice president finance and Cynthia Boeddeker as vice president-general merchandise manager.
Berg previously was executive vice president.
Bury was vice president-controller and Boeddeker, director of sourcing and inventory.
PremiumWear markets Munsingwear brand knit shirts and other apparel items.
